FuncDef: The display dns ipv6 dynamic-host command displays IPv6 dynamic DNS entries. The display dns ipv6 dynamic-host command displays IPv6 dynamic DNS entries. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the domain name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters. If the string is enclosed in double quotation marks ("), spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Examples: <HUAWEI> display dns ipv6 dynamic-host vpn-instance vpn1
